text:
Hey there, Hugh we’re always striving to make our documentation better.

We recently made some under the hood changes to our docs that enable us to provide a better experience, unfortunately that broke a few links, and this may be one of those.

Can you link me to where you saw this so we can get it fixed right away?

Hi Hugh, thank you for this feedback.

We definitely want to improve the experience.

We’re trying to solve for developers at varying skill levels, and frankly we know and want to do better at it.

Our HubSpot CMS Developer Guides page has a series of introductory tutorials. Because your needs may vary for what you personally are trying to accomplish these tutorials are written so you do not need to complete them in any specific order.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides#getting-started>

If you feel you want a very structured linear learning experience, I highly recommend checking out the lessons from the HubSpot Academy <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides#lessons-from-HubSpot-academy-for-developers>

Hi everyone. I'm Padraig, the founder of <http://QueryLayer.com|QueryLayer.com>. New to HubSpot CMS. We are going to run our marketing website off HubSpot CMS. ... it nees a lot of work :slightly_smiling_face:
